name: adaptive-bloom-filter
description: Fast, memory-efficient bloom filter with adaptive compression and async operations for JavaScript
author: Leon Kalema

scripts.demo: node -e "const { AdaptiveBloomFilter } = require('./src/index.js'); const f = new AdaptiveBloomFilter(1000, 0.01); f.add('test'); console.log('Works:', f.check('test'));"
scripts.benchmark: node -e "const { AdaptiveBloomFilter } = require('./src/index.js'); const f = new AdaptiveBloomFilter(100000, 0.01); console.time('Add 10k items'); for(let i=0; i<10000; i++) f.add('item-'+i); console.timeEnd('Add 10k items');"
